Episodes.Title: Scratch's Hidden Treasures
Episodes.Plot: It's Scratch's first day and he really wants to fit in with the team. When he finds buried treasure outside Fixham Museum, Scoop and Muck decide that Scratch is the best one to dig it up!

Episodes.Title: Scrambler's Best Idea
Episodes.Plot: When Roley wins the Playtime Build Competition, Scrambler is disappointed and decides to go ahead and build his own tree-house anyway!

Episodes.Title: Scoop The Artist
Episodes.Plot: Scoop is star struck when he meets famous artist, David Mockney, and decides he wants to be an artist too!

Episodes.Title: High Tide for Lofty
Episodes.Plot: Bob and the team rebuild the Old Pier, but Lofty is afraid to get close to the water.

Episodes.Title: Roley's Rovers
Episodes.Plot: When the machines find an old football to play with, Wendy jokes that they need a mascot.

Episodes.Title: Start from Scratch
Episodes.Plot: Scoop shows Scratch how to juggle kick a football, and Bob is impressed.

Episodes.Title: Night Time Scratch
Episodes.Plot: Scratch is excited about installing new floodlights at the football field.

Episodes.Title: Lofty and the Monster
Episodes.Plot: Scoop, Dizzy and Scrambler are playing a game of monster chase. However, Lofty doesn't realise that it's only a game...

Episodes.Title: Dizzy in Charge
Episodes.Plot: When Bob is called away on a job, he leaves Dizzy and Scratch to tidy up the builder's yard.

Episodes.Title: Lofty's Helpful Day
Episodes.Plot: Lofty really wants to be as helpful as he can, but ends up taking on so many jobs that he gets confused.

Episodes.Title: Scoop's Sea Rescue
Episodes.Plot: Scoop dreams of being a brave sea captain and, before long, he has to make a real sea rescue!

Episodes.Title: Scratch's Star Turn
Episodes.Plot: It is Fixham History Day and Dickie Olivier, the famous actor, is putting on a show. Bob and the team turn an old ship into a stage and Scratch is thrilled when he lands a part in the play.

Episodes.Title: Pineapple Scratch
Episodes.Plot: Brad plans a party to celebrate the opening of his beach cafe but realises he has lost his pineapple and his conch shell.

Episodes.Title: Scrambler's Stage Surprise
Episodes.Plot: A storm has damaged the Fixham theatre, and Dickie Olivier's play opens tonight, so the team have to work fast to get everything repaired!

Episodes.Title: Wendy's Birthday Surprise
Episodes.Plot: Getting ready for Wendy's surprise birthday party proves to be a challenge, especially when Scoop tries to do everything himself. When Wendy's birthday present falls into the well the team are working on, Scoop realises he needs help from his friends to complete the job and get the party ready on time.

Episodes.Title: Scratch Goes Solo
Episodes.Plot: As the rest of the team help put up an old school bell, Scratch has a solo job digging for Farmer Pickles. But Scratch soon becomes lonely and realizes that it's more fun to do jobs with his friends.

Episodes.Title: Dizzy and the Wheelies
Episodes.Plot: Dizzy's amazing wheelies are a real hit with the group, but when he is upstaged by another friend, Dizzy gets upset. Trying to prove that he still does the best wheelies, Dizzy starts to cause chaos on the building site!

Episodes.Title: Muck's Beach Tower
Episodes.Plot: As the team go to the beach for a job, Muck gets excited about building a sandcastle. But his sandcastle build ends up compromising the job that the team were asked to complete on the beach.

Episodes.Title: Here Comes Muck
Episodes.Plot: The team rebuild the yard, starting with new garages for themselves. As Muck focuses on being the first one out of the new garage, the rest of the team want to all come out at the same time.

Episodes.Title: Scrambler Gets Clean
Episodes.Plot: The team are excited to finish building the new machine wash, but Scrambler is a little scared of the big machine. Scrambler tries to stay clean during the job, but when he needs to drive into a mud puddle he needs to face his fears and get a wash - and he soon discovers that it's actually quite fun.
